(deftagsum chat-role
  (:system nil)
  (:user nil)
  (:assistant nil)
  (:tool nil))
role-systemmacro
(defmacro role-system nil '(chat-role-system))
role-usermacro
(defmacro role-user nil '(chat-role-user))
role-assistantmacro
(defmacro role-assistant nil '(chat-role-assistant))
role-toolmacro
(defmacro role-tool nil '(chat-role-tool))
other
(defprod chat-message
  ((role chat-role-p "The role of the message sender") (content stringp
      "The text content of the message"
      :default ""))
  :layout :list)
other
(define make-system-message
  ((content stringp))
  :returns (msg chat-message-p)
  (make-chat-message :role (role-system) :content content))
other
(define make-user-message
  ((content stringp))
  :returns (msg chat-message-p)
  (make-chat-message :role (role-user) :content content))
other
(define make-assistant-message
  ((content stringp))
  :returns (msg chat-message-p)
  (make-chat-message :role (role-assistant) :content content))
other
(define make-tool-message
  ((content stringp))
  :returns (msg chat-message-p)
  (make-chat-message :role (role-tool) :content content))
other
(deflist chat-message-list
  :elt-type chat-message-p
  :true-listp t)
other
(define has-system-message-p
  ((messages chat-message-list-p))
  :returns (has booleanp)
  (if (endp messages)
    nil
    (let ((role (chat-message->role (car messages))))
      (or (chat-role-case role :system t :otherwise nil)
        (has-system-message-p (cdr messages))))))
other
(define last-assistant-content
  ((messages chat-message-list-p))
  :returns (content stringp)
  (if (endp messages)
    ""
    (let* ((msg (car (last messages))) (role (chat-message->role msg)))
      (if (chat-role-case role :assistant t :otherwise nil)
        (chat-message->content msg)
        ""))))
other
(define chat-role-to-string
  ((role chat-role-p))
  :returns (s stringp)
  (chat-role-case role
    :system "system"
    :user "user"
    :assistant "assistant"
    :tool "tool"))
other
(define string-to-chat-role
  ((s stringp))
  :returns (role chat-role-p)
  (cond ((equal s "system") (role-system))
    ((equal s "user") (role-user))
    ((equal s "assistant") (role-assistant))
    ((equal s "tool") (role-tool))
    (t (role-user))))
chat-role-to-string-returns-valid-stringtheorem
(defthm chat-role-to-string-returns-valid-string
  (implies (chat-role-p role)
    (member-equal (chat-role-to-string role)
      '("system" "user" "assistant" "tool")))
  :hints (("Goal" :in-theory (enable chat-role-to-string))))
string-to-chat-role-roundtriptheorem
(defthm string-to-chat-role-roundtrip
  (implies (and (stringp s)
      (member-equal s '("system" "user" "assistant" "tool")))
    (equal (chat-role-to-string (string-to-chat-role s)) s))
  :hints (("Goal" :in-theory (enable chat-role-to-string string-to-chat-role))))
other
(deftagsum model-type
  (:llm nil)
  (:vlm nil)
  (:embeddings nil))
other
(define model-type-to-string
  ((mt model-type-p))
  :returns (s stringp)
  (model-type-case mt
    :llm "llm"
    :vlm "vlm"
    :embeddings "embeddings"))
other
(define string-to-model-type
  ((s stringp))
  :returns (mt model-type-p)
  (cond ((equal s "llm") (model-type-llm))
    ((equal s "vlm") (model-type-vlm))
    ((equal s "embeddings") (model-type-embeddings))
    (t (model-type-llm))))
other
(deftagsum model-state (:loaded nil) (:not-loaded nil))
other
(define model-state-to-string
  ((ms model-state-p))
  :returns (s stringp)
  (model-state-case ms
    :loaded "loaded"
    :not-loaded "not-loaded"))
other
(define string-to-model-state
  ((s stringp))
  :returns (ms model-state-p)
  (if (equal s "loaded")
    (model-state-loaded)
    (model-state-not-loaded)))
other
(defprod model-info
  ((id stringp "Model identifier" :default "") (type model-type-p "Type: llm, vlm, or embeddings")
    (load-state model-state-p "Whether model is loaded")
    (publisher stringp "Model publisher" :default "")
    (arch stringp "Model architecture" :default "")
    (quantization stringp "Quantization level" :default "")
    (max-context-length natp
      "Maximum context length"
      :default 0)
    (loaded-context-length natp
      "Loaded context length (0 if not loaded)"
      :default 0))
  :layout :list)
other
(define model-loaded-p
  ((m model-info-p))
  :returns (loaded booleanp)
  (let ((st (model-info->load-state m)))
    (model-state-case st :loaded t :not-loaded nil)))
other
(define model-is-llm-p
  ((m model-info-p))
  :returns (is-llm booleanp)
  (let ((tp (model-info->type m)))
    (model-type-case tp :llm t :otherwise nil)))
other
(define model-is-completions-p
  ((m model-info-p))
  :returns (is-completions booleanp)
  "True for models that can do chat/text completions (llm or vlm)"
  (let ((tp (model-info->type m)))
    (model-type-case tp :llm t :vlm t :embeddings nil)))
other
(deflist model-info-list
  :elt-type model-info-p
  :true-listp t)
filter-loaded-modelsfunction
(defun filter-loaded-models
  (models)
  (declare (xargs :guard (model-info-list-p models)))
  (cond ((endp models) nil)
    ((model-loaded-p (model-info-fix (car models))) (cons (model-info-fix (car models))
        (filter-loaded-models (cdr models))))
    (t (filter-loaded-models (cdr models)))))
filter-completions-modelsfunction
(defun filter-completions-models
  (models)
  (declare (xargs :guard (model-info-list-p models)))
  (cond ((endp models) nil)
    ((model-is-completions-p (model-info-fix (car models))) (cons (model-info-fix (car models))
        (filter-completions-models (cdr models))))
    (t (filter-completions-models (cdr models)))))
filter-loaded-completions-modelsfunction
(defun filter-loaded-completions-models
  (models)
  (declare (xargs :guard (model-info-list-p models)))
  (filter-loaded-models (filter-completions-models models)))
other
(deftagsum llm-provider
  (:local nil)
  (:openai nil)
  (:anthropic nil)
  (:azure nil)
  (:custom nil))
other
(define llm-provider-to-string
  ((p llm-provider-p))
  :returns (s stringp)
  (llm-provider-case p
    :local "local"
    :openai "openai"
    :anthropic "anthropic"
    :azure "azure"
    :custom "custom"))
other
(define string-to-llm-provider
  ((s stringp))
  :returns (p llm-provider-p)
  (cond ((equal s "local") (llm-provider-local))
    ((equal s "openai") (llm-provider-openai))
    ((equal s "anthropic") (llm-provider-anthropic))
    ((equal s "azure") (llm-provider-azure))
    ((equal s "custom") (llm-provider-custom))
    (t (llm-provider-local))))
other
(defprod llm-provider-config
  ((provider llm-provider-p "Provider type") (endpoint stringp "API endpoint URL" :default "")
    (api-key stringp "API key (empty for local)" :default "")
    (model stringp "Default model to use" :default "")
    (org-id stringp "Organization ID (optional)" :default ""))
  :layout :list)
make-local-configmacro
(defmacro make-local-config
  (&key (model '""))
  `(make-llm-provider-config :provider (llm-provider-local)
    :endpoint "http://host.docker.internal:1234/v1/chat/completions"
    :api-key ""
    :model ,MODEL
    :org-id ""))
make-openai-configmacro
(defmacro make-openai-config
  (&key api-key (model '"gpt-4o-mini") (org-id '""))
  `(make-llm-provider-config :provider (llm-provider-openai)
    :endpoint "https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions"
    :api-key ,API-KEY
    :model ,MODEL
    :org-id ,ORG-ID))
make-custom-configmacro
(defmacro make-custom-config
  (&key endpoint api-key model)
  `(make-llm-provider-config :provider (llm-provider-custom)
    :endpoint ,ENDPOINT
    :api-key ,API-KEY
    :model ,MODEL
    :org-id ""))
other
(define provider-requires-api-key-p
  ((config llm-provider-config-p))
  :returns (requires booleanp)
  (let ((prov (llm-provider-config->provider config)))
    (llm-provider-case prov
      :local nil
      :openai t
      :anthropic t
      :azure t
      :custom t)))
other
(define llm-config-valid-p
  ((config llm-provider-config-p))
  :returns (valid booleanp)
  (and (not (equal "" (llm-provider-config->endpoint config)))
    (or (not (provider-requires-api-key-p config))
      (not (equal "" (llm-provider-config->api-key config))))))
